Story name: S95: As a driver, I can signup with a mobile number

Story name:
S97: As a driver, I can add my picture and relevant documents 
(Identification card, driving license, Image, Vehicle image)
S98: As driver, i can receive notification for consignment request from Merchant side
So that: He can deliver the consignment and make money

Story name: S99 As a driver, I can either accept or reject the requested consignment.
User want: take consignment accordingly due to there availability

Story name: S100: As a driver, Recieve consignment from the consignee & move to delivery address
User want: take consignment from the consignee & move to devilery address

Story name: S101: As a driver, I can navigate the consignment's delivery location & can update the status of the consignment.
User want: change the current status of the consignment
So that: everyone know where the consignment really is

Story name: S102 As driver, i should able to call consignee
So that: He can contact- user for consignment delivery.

Story name: S103: As driver, i can able update the consignment status whether it is received by consignee or not received.
S104: As a driver, I can able to register my vehicle (add image, add vehicle documents)
S106:As driver i can be able to logout from the app
User want: As driver i can be able to logout from the app

Story name: S107: As driver i can ask delivery code to consignee to end the consignment delivery
User want: As driver i can ask delivery code to consignee to end the consignment delivery

Story name: S108: As a driver, I can select the union I want to register
